thread.title: This Adorable Delhi Couple Met On A Fitness App And Are Now Getting Married
thread.title_full: This Adorable Delhi Couple Met On A Fitness App And Are Now Getting Married

author: Sonia Mariam Thomas
title: This Adorable Delhi Couple Met On A Fitness App And Are Now Getting Married
text:
View this image ›
HealthifyMe ID: 10525805 2. Both of them were going through their own personal fitness journeys and joined the fitness app, Healthifyme, to be able to get further with it. HealthifyMe
HealthifyMe
 ID: 10527171 3. Over the course of time, they started talking over WhatsApp and began motivating each other to meet their individual goals. And soon enough, they started dating. View this image ›
HealthifyMe ID: 10525809 4. After having met in October 2015, Rajat popped the question in a treasure hunt-style proposal in August 2016. HealthifyMe
HealthifyMe
 “I left clues for her with her friends and family across the city, after which she received a hamper. The clues eventually led her to The Oberoi in Gurgaon, where I eventually proposed to her,” Rajat told BuzzFeed.
ID: 10527332 5. “We got closer when we started sharing our stories of weight loss and as things moved on, we realised we really liked each other. Soon, one thing led to another and here we are,” Rajat added. View this image ›
HealthifyMe Of course, because look at them blushing and happily walking each other through a crowd.
ID: 10525808 6. The couple will begin their journey into blissful married life on February 28. Cheers to the happy couple, and cheers to true love everywhere. View this image ›
HealthifyMe BRB, going back to my regular single life, which includes crying while drinking a bottle of wine.
ID: 10525801
